name: Get to the Truth
description: Complete the Event Objectives to get Investigator Tuvok!

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

participation_rewards.name: Honor
participation_rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Tuvok
rewards.flavor: Security Chief for Captain Janeway, and former infiltrator of the Maquis ship Val Jean.

ship.name: U.S.S. Cerritos
ship.flavor: The U.S.S. Cerritos is a California-class engineering and operations support cruiser that endured many perilous events, but kept going, against all odds.

rewards.name: Tuvok
rewards.flavor: To aid Carol Freeman's investigation, Tuvok uses an invasive mind meld to uncover the truth behind the attack on Pakled.

milestones.requirement: Level up Crew from Star Trek: Lower Decks 30 times
Level up Crew from Star Trek: Lower Decks 60 times

rewards.name: Tuvok
rewards.flavor: To aid Carol Freeman's investigation, Tuvok uses an invasive mind meld to uncover the truth behind the attack on Pakled.

milestones.requirement: Level up Crew from Star Trek: Lower Decks 90 times
Complete 50 Ship Battles using the U.S.S. Cerritos
Complete 125 Ship Battles using the U.S.S. Cerritos

rewards.name: Tuvok
rewards.flavor: To aid Carol Freeman's investigation, Tuvok uses an invasive mind meld to uncover the truth behind the attack on Pakled.

milestones.requirement: Complete 250 Ship Battles using the U.S.S. Cerritos

name: Critical Chroniton Levels!
description: Expend Chronitons in order to receive valuable Crew Retrieval rewards!

rewards.name: Quantum Energy
rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

participation_rewards.name: ISM
participation_rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM

name: Prepare for a Faction Event
description: Get supplies to power up your crew and bolster your Shuttle Missions

rewards.name: Time Reduction
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) Decreases time to completion by 02:30:00.

participation_rewards.name: Merits
participation_rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

participation_rewards.name: Time Reduction
participation_rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) Decreases time to completion by 01:30:00.

participation_rewards.name: Tokens
participation_rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.
